settings.title: MegaPeelEX
settings.heading: MegaPeel EX®
settings.content:
An innovative hybrid microdermabrasion machine that delivers the best of both worlds with Crystal & Diamond Microdermabrasion. Offer your clients the gold standard in aesthetic and medical microdermabrasion equipment.

Learn More

settings.title: The Pear 3D
settings.heading: AESTHETIC IMAGING WITH THE PEAR 3D
settings.content:
PROVIDE TRUE PHOTO ANALYSIS FOR PLANNING AND EVALUATING FACIAL REJUVENATION TREATMENTS AND SKIN CARE REGIMENS WITH THE PEAR 3D.

Learn More

settings.title: Before + After
settings.subheading: Results indicate continued improvement over a six-month period.
settings.heading: As Early As The First Treatment
settings.content: TAMA devices stimulate the facial tissues to promote skin rejuvenation and cell renewal. This safe electromagnetic stimulus promotes normal cell activity and, as a result, the face looks brighter and revitalized, resulting in a healthier, glowing and toned appearance.

settings.title: Microdermabrasion
settings.heading: Mechanical Exfoliation with MegaPeel
settings.content: Physically removes dead skin cells ~ Promotes new cell formation ~ Vacuum massage stimulates circulation & collagen production ~ Provides a safe and even exfoliation for all skin types

settings.title: Clean Skincare
settings.heading: Clean & clinical skincare
settings.content: Effective active ingredients provides nutrients to nourish skin ~ Free of harmful ingredients ~ Helps to reduce inflammation ~ Personalized skincare regimens available with our condition specific products

settings.heading: DermaMed solutions Professional Site
settings.newsletter_text:
This site is for professionals only. If you had a professional account with us on our previous site, click "ENTER PASSWORD" on upper right corner of this page and enter the password that was emailed to you.

Please contact orders@dermamedsolutions or call us at 610.358.4447 for additional assistance.

Non-professional customers can head over to www.dmskincare.com for our retail products.

settings.title: dmglow
settings.content: Learn more about our most requested protocol - dmGlow. Lymphatic drainage, microdermabrasion + more.
